14 #ifndef MEASUREMENT_ODOM_H
15 #define MEASUREMENT_ODOM_H
16 
17 #include "measurement.h"
18 
19 namespace measurement {
20 class OdomMeasurement : public Measurement {
21  public:
22  // Construct Encoder measurement
23  OdomMeasurement() {
24  type_ = ODOM;
25  translation_ = Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
26  rotation_ = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
27  transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
28  }
29 
30  OdomMeasurement(const Eigen::Vector3d& translation,
31  const Eigen::Quaternion<double>& quaternion,
32  const uint64_t seq_in, const double time_stamp_in,
33  const std::string frame_id_in) {
34  type_ = ODOM;
35 
36  translation_ = Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
37 
38  rotation_ = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
39 
40  transformation_ = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
41 
42  set_translation(translation); // [x, y, z]
43  set_rotation(quaternion); // [x, y, z]
44  set_header(seq_in, time_stamp_in, frame_id_in);
45 
46  set_transformation();
47  }
48 
49 
50  void set_translation(const Eigen::Vector3d& position_in) {
51  translation_(0) = position_in(0);
52  translation_(1) = position_in(1);
53  translation_(2) = position_in(2);
54  }
55 
56  void set_rotation(const Eigen::Quaternion<double>& orientation_quat) {
57  rotation_ = orientation_quat.toRotationMatrix();
58  }
59 
60  void set_transformation() {
61  transformation_.block<3, 3>(0, 0) = rotation_;
62  transformation_.block<3, 1>(0, 3) = translation_;
63  }
64 
65  inline const Eigen::Matrix4d& get_transformation() const {
66  return transformation_;
67  }
68 
69 
70  private:
71  Eigen::Vector3d translation_;
72  Eigen::Matrix3d rotation_;
73  Eigen::Matrix4d transformation_;
74 };
75 
76 } // namespace measurement
